dct_title_s: A map of the River Gambra from it's mouth to Eropina
dct_description_sm: by Captn. John Leach in 1732 ; T. Kitchin sculpt.
Relief shown pictorially and depths by bathymetric soundings.
Shows topography, drainage, cities and towns, routes.
Decorative cartouche (with indigenous figure, flora and fauna).
"No. 57" at bottom left; "Plate XLI. Vol. 2 page 159" at bottom right.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Caroline Batchelor Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
